bug.author: jlewi
bug.description:
/kind process Creating this bug to track creating a minikf 1.0 RC. The minikf page looks like the last update is from 201909 <denchmark-link:https://www.arrikto.com/minikf/>https://www.arrikto.com/minikf/</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vkoukis>@vkoukis</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yanniszark>@yanniszark</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/elikatsis>@elikatsis</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jbottum>@jbottum</denchmark-link> do we have an ETA for a minikf 1.0 RC?

comments.comment:

kind/bug 0.75
Please mark this comment with or to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-botdata/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> , we are actively preparing MiniKF 1.0. We've tested everything and we are currently ironing out a couple of small details. Our plan is to have MiniKF with KF 1.0 available for use in both Vagrant and GCP on the day right after the 1.0 release.

MiniKF with Kubeflow 1.0 is available on GCP and Vagrant. We have also updated the Kubeflow docs to always show the MiniKF and Kubeflow version:
GCP Vagrant
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> , I think we should close this issue
